meanings.definition: Having a petulant or sulky expression
meanings.sent1: She wore the poutiest face when she didn't get her favorite toy.
meanings.sent2: The child's poutiest look indicated her disappointment.
meanings.sent3: Even the poutiest cat can't resist a warm lap.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds gathered in the sky, looking poutiest before the rain.
meanings.sent5: His poutiest expression made everyone around him feel gloomy.

meanings.definition: Showing displeasure or annoyance by protruding the lips
meanings.sent1: The poutiest girl in class always stuck out her lips when upset.
meanings.sent2: He gave me the poutiest look when I told him we couldn't go to the park.
meanings.sent3: The poutiest puppy at the shelter won everyone's heart with its sad eyes.
meanings.sent4: The old house looked poutiest with its peeling paint and sagging roof.
meanings.sent5: Her poutiest expression made it clear she was not happy with the situation.

meanings.definition: Displaying a sullen or moody attitude
meanings.sent1: The poutiest teenager in the group refused to join the activities.
meanings.sent2: She had the poutiest demeanor at the party, making others uneasy.
meanings.sent3: The poutiest cloud in the sky seemed to mirror my bad mood.
meanings.sent4: His poutiest behavior at work led to misunderstandings with his colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The poutiest expression on her face hinted at deeper feelings of sadness.
